articles.author: Serenitie Wang, CNN
articles.title: How I survived 70 days' confinement in the world's toughest Covid lockdown
articles.description: In Hong Kong, Omicron was running amok, but in Shanghai cases were still in the single digits and with China's iron-fisted approach to infections it seemed reasonable to think things would stay that way. That was my first mistake.
articles.content:
Shanghai, China (CNN)When I left a Covid-ravaged Hong Kong, I was in search of a sanctuary.
It was early March and the city was in the throes of the biggest coronavirus outbreak per capita in the wo… [+12766 chars]

articles.author: Fredreka Schouten, CNN
articles.title: Election standoff ends in New Mexico county after false fraud claims threw primary certification into question
articles.description: The majority of a county commission in a rural swath of New Mexico on Friday voted to certify the results of the June 7 primary, ending a standoff with state officials that had set off national alarms about potential election subversion.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: Could House Democrats lose 70 seats this fall?
articles.description: Last month, Newt Gingrich made a bold (and seemingly wild) prediction about the midterm elections.

articles.author: Alicia Wallace, CNN Business
articles.title: Here's what the Fed rate hike means for your salary
articles.description: American workers have seen their wages climb faster than at any time since the mid-1980s. But high inflation means workers have been handed a pay cut.

articles.title: The malaise of Joe Biden

articles.author: Allison Morrow
articles.title: A spate of layoffs is fueling recession anxiety
articles.description: Two years ago, when the pandemic ushered in the sharpest economic downturn on record, it sparked a tidal wave of layoffs.
articles.content: A version of this story first appeared in CNN Business Before the Bell newsletter. Not a subscriber? You can sign up right here. You can listen to an audio version of the newsletter by clicking the s… [+7495 chars]

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: The best cure for high gas prices could be -- high gas prices
articles.description: There's not a lot that Joe Biden, Congress or the Federal Reserve can do to bring down the record high gas prices. High gas prices themselves might do the job for them.

articles.author: Desmond Lachman for CNN Business Perspectives
articles.title: Opinion: The Fed's latest rate hike will be a disaster for the economy
articles.description: One reason to think that the Fed's shift to a more hawkish policy stance could bring on a recession is that it has already caused the asset and credit market bubbles it created last year to burst.
articles.content: Editors Note: Desmond Lachman is a senior fellow at the American Enterprise Institute. He was a deputy director in the International Monetary Funds Policy Development and Review Department and the ch… [+3163 chars]

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN Business
articles.title: Mortgage rates hit 5.78%, the biggest weekly jump since 1987
articles.description: Mortgage rates surged by more than half a percentage point this week amid rising inflation and an interest rate hike by the Federal Reserve, according to Freddie Mac. The jump is the largest one-week increase since 1987.
